name: Crazy Car Rush
description:
Drive around the other cars and try to get as far as you can. 
Pick up wrenches to exchange them for new cars. 

Have fun playing. 

a release for Android is planned. 

Controls
  • Move your car with "A" and "D" or  the "left" and "right" arrows
Credits Icons:
  • Pause Icons made by Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com
  • Wrench Icon Icons made by Good Ware from www.flaticon.com
